name: Deep Under (Mr. Code)
description:
In this game, you need to survive underwater.

Problem is, the surface's oxygen is toxic and radiated, so you must extract oxygen from plants.

You must find a way to open the hatch to the abandoned base on the island.

This game was made in 2 weeks for the "My First Game Jam: Winter 2023" jam.

It was made by me and my friends.

Credits:

Programming - Mr. Code

Modeling - Livwil

Sound Design and emotional support - MrBip

Music - Context Sensitive

Special thanks to Olive_verte
